name: Tanks Battle Snow: Steel Assau
description:
Tanks Battle Snow: Steel Assault War!!!
Aim your targets carefully, counter attack and destroy all wold war machines of enemy forces. Keep alive as long as in the tank battle you can because it is the game of survival. Use the destructive power of your tank war revolution in the best way possible.
=> 3D Stunning high graphics
=> Different real tanks from World War 2
=> Different missions and locations: mountains and villages
=> Easy to play and learn fast
=> Full action packed with army firefighters
=> Best tank game ever
